column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " How can you marry each other ?
#Text=I know !
#Text=" Jim says : " I tried to fight it , but she really grew on me !
#Text=" Iroh says : " The Spirit World is very mysterious , but so is love .
#Text=Help yourself to some tea and cakes .
#Text=They are spirit cakes , so you wo n't gain any weight - of course , you wo n't lose any either !
#Text=" Korra says : " This part of the Spirit World is n't so scary .
#Text=My teapot !
#Text=" Iroh says : " That 's right .
#Text=It was yours long , long ago .
#Text=When you were Avatar Wan , you used it to carry the light spirit , Raava , around - until the two of you became one .
#Text=It is my favorite thing I found here .
#Text=You know , when you make tea in it , you can still taste a little light in every cup .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Wow .
#Text=I could just stay in here forever , reading .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " The last human who said that is still here .
#Text="
